name: LINE dictionary: Chinese-Eng
description: A free LINE Chinese-English Dictionary!  With fast & easy offline search for brief definitions and online search for detailed definitions, LINE Dictionary operates online & offline!  LINE Chinese-English Dictionary - Contains Collins Chinese-English, English-Chinese dictionary(Main definitions are supported offline). - The broadest Chinese dictionary containing about 3,000,000 headwords - Functions such as Chinese sentence analyzer, handwriting input support, auxiliary dictionary word card and stroke order demonstrations provide you with the most convenient environment for learning Chinese - Providing not only the pronunciation for words and sentences but also the dialogue, quote and proverb of the day, LINE Dictionary can be your private Chinese instructor.  * NOTE: Line Dictionary only supports simplified Chinese!  LINE Dictionary is a free online language study tool for everyone. Improve your foreign laugange skills at any time, any place with your mobile device! Install and try it right now!   Required Access Permissions  Save: You can see the entry words and their short meanings that are shown at auto-complete list.
